added: Make it possible to quickly sort the list of models based on their name

changed: Add an indicator to the draggable objects on the page

added: allow for reordering of models in a group using an drag and drop interaction
make it possible to move groups in and around collections
Added the ability to update the names of collections, groups and models
changed: Removed the floating action button in favour of having simple one click action buttons
Made it possible to delete a collection at any time (not just empty collections)
Trigger an error when creating a model 0 miniatures linked

added: If there is only one collection when creating a group it now automatically selects it

bugfixes: Make the summary section on collection and group page mobile responsive
Fix the automatic redirect that was triggered when hitting enter in a form

added: Added breadcrumbs to all pages which allow navigation back to the home page
Proper fallback pages with actual text to display when an error occurs
Allow for creating collections, groups and managing models
Make it possible to update your workflow to fit your process of from the box till fully finished
Generate a proper gradient fitting the amount of workflow steps
Make it possible to export and import your application state
removed: Removed page-fallback component as it would be a 99% duplication of the app-fallback

added: Added initial roadmap for future features
changed: Changed the initial Material theme to one with a custom color palette

added: Added application manifest file to the index file of the application
Created the application and added required tooling to get started
